title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE(S)
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include one (1) of Botany, Zoology, Biology or Chemistry.

 

(ii)    ND/NCE in related programme/subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHEMICAL SCIENCES
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: DEMOGRAPHY & STATISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A'  level passes in Geography, Economics, Government and Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government and any one of Geography or Biology
subjects: Mathematics, Economics/Geography and any other subject.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Physics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE AND LITERATURE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE merit/'A' Level passes in History and one (1) other relevant Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History and three (3) relevant Arts subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION & POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects chosen from Government or History, Economics and Geography/Physics.

(ii) NCE merit in Government/History, Economics and Geography/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalent to include English Language, Government/History and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Social Studies from recognized Colleges.

(ii)           Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language plus two (2) Arts /Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

title: ENGLISH & LITERARY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: GEOGRAPHY & ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Geography and one (1) other science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Geography and any two (2) of Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Agricultural Science.

title: GEOLOGY & MINING
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

de_requirements: credit) in History/ Government and any other related subject.

de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.

title: INDUSTRIAL DESIGN
de_requirements:
(i)   'A' Level passes in Two (2) of Fine Arts, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Physics.

(ii)  ND in Industrial Design or Glass Technology or Fine Art at credit level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Fine Art, Mathematics, Chemistry. Spinning; Weaving; Surface Design and Printing; Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing; Ceramics; Graphic Design; Graphic Printing; Decorative Painting, Spray  Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Building/Engineering Drawing, General Wood Work.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Fine Arts/Physics.

title: INDUSTRIAL PHYSICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: As for Physics
subjects: As for Physics

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Government or History and three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and Geography/Government/History.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).

subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.

) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.
